title: Can you still get a reservation at a Boston Michelin restaurant?
author: Katelyn Umholtz
bullets: Food News Michelin Boston restaurants are harder to get into — here’s when to book.
Mahaniyom, a Brookline restaurant that received a Bib Gourmand rating at last week's Michelin Guide ceremony, is now harder to get a reservation.
David L Ryan/Globe Staff ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Karen Read case: Alberts, McCabes, and Higgins crowdfund legal expenses as civil case heats up
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News “Silence is no longer an option.
It is time to stand up.
Financial support is needed to defend the truth.

title: Eater names Portland eatery as one of the best new restaurants in America
author: Frances Klemm
bullets: Food News It's the only New England spot to earn a place on Eater's list of 15 best new restaurants in the U.
Portland, Maine Adam Himmelsbach Eater has released their annual list of the 15 best new restaurants in America, and a Portland, Maine eatery is the only New England spot to make the cut.

title: Evan Dando is alive and well and living in Brazil
author: Blake Maddux
bullets: Music The Boston native-turned-São Paulo resident is back with a memoir, a new Lemonheads album, and a Boston show Wednesday night.
Antonia Teixeira By Blake Maddux November 24, 2025 | 2:22 PM 6 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.
